name: El Donte's Bizarre Adventure
description:
El Donte's Bizarre Adventure is a Devil May Cry meme game based off of El Donte El Exterminador de Demonios.

In this short adventure you play as El Donte, paying your financial debts with the help of Vergil until you start hearing about the Cult of the Five Dantes.

El Donte is unhappy, and wants to prove himself as the SIGMA of all Dantes.

With the help of Vergil, you must take down the Five Dantes, and prove your greatness once more.

GameJolt Page: https://gamejolt.com/games/edsba/775878

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Current Update v1.0.1

  • Fixed visual bug with the 'Keen Eye' Trophy
  • Title screen options no longer slide in.

Update Plans:

  • Android Port
  • Devil Trigger System
  • Doubtful and Stranded Cultist's Special Moves
  • Cutscene Skips
  • More Trophies
